DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate immunological efficacy safety GC3110A among healthy adult 65 year age .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety GC3110A Healthy Subjects Aged 65 Years Older
DOC.detailed_description: Adults 65 year age administer GC3110A ( Quadrivalent influenza vaccine ) .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult age 65 year old Informed consent form sign date Able comply requirement study Known systemic hypersensitivity egg , chicken protein , vaccine component Personal history GuillainBarre syndrome ( GBS ) Subjects severe chronic disease consider investigator ineligible study Subjects receive vaccination within 28 day enrollment schedule another vaccination study Immunocompromised subject immunodeficiency disease subject receive immunosuppressive immunomodulating therapy
